reviews.text: Unfortunately a person had been hit by a train between dawlish and Totnes and was delaying trains to Exeter st David’s. I understand that this is a difficult thing to manage but the station staff didn’t help matters as they kept walking off as soon as you ask them a question. Do any off the staff understand that a lot off people in this area are tourists and are not familiar with the area. Again I understand and feel for the person involved but plans must be in place for these incidents.

The ticket staff here are so nice...a credit to the company. However, needed to park on next visit and car park full so had to park in town and rush to the station plus I had to return early as could only get 48 hour parking.  Might be best to advise travellers that parking only available to early passengers.
